includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 1
includedAssets.synopsis: It is April 1912, and news arrives of the sinking of the Titanic with the loss of Downton's heir James and his son Patrick.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It is April 1912, and news arrives of the sinking of the Titanic with the loss of Downton's heir James and his son Patrick.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It is April 1912, and news arrives of the sinking of the Titanic with the loss of Downton's heir James and his son Patrick.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Matthew and his mother Isobel arrive at Downton, but trouble lies ahead for them both.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matthew and his mother Isobel arrive at Downton, but trouble lies ahead for them both.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matthew and his mother Isobel arrive at Downton, but trouble lies ahead for them both.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Downton is turned into a convalescent home to accommodate soldiers coming back from the front line.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Downton is turned into a convalescent home to accommodate soldiers coming back from the front line.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Downton is turned into a convalescent home to accommodate soldiers coming back from the front line.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Violet and Isobel are in conflict over a medical ailment affecting Molesley. Elsewhere, Carson fears there is a thief at Downton.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Violet and Isobel are in conflict over a medical ailment affecting Molesley. Elsewhere, Carson fears there is a thief at Downton.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Violet and Isobel are in conflict over a medical ailment affecting Molesley. Elsewhere, Carson fears there is a thief at Downton.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Mary is introduced to a potential suitor, but she thinks he is too old and stuffy. Mrs Patmore fears she may be going blind.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mary is introduced to a potential suitor, but she thinks he is too old and stuffy. Mrs Patmore fears she may be going blind.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mary is introduced to a potential suitor, but she thinks he is too old and stuffy. Mrs Patmore fears she may be going blind.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Sybil's interest in politics gets her in trouble. Matthew and Mary's relationship takes an unexpected turn.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sybil's interest in politics gets her in trouble. Matthew and Mary's relationship takes an unexpected turn.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sybil's interest in politics gets her in trouble. Matthew and Mary's relationship takes an unexpected turn.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 7
includedAssets.synopsis: The family is astonished when Lady Cora Crawley finds that she is pregnant.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The family is astonished when Lady Cora Crawley finds that she is pregnant.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The family is astonished when Lady Cora Crawley finds that she is pregnant.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Julian Fellowes' much-loved period drama follows the goings on at an aristocratic country estate, where the Crawley family and their servants experience tragedy and triumph against a backdrop of political and social change. Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Dan Stevens and Joanne Froggatt are among the stars of this multi-Golden Globe and Emmy-winning smash. In the opening series, The Earl and Countess of Grantham search for an heir to Downton Abbey.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Earl and Countess of Grantham search for an heir to Downton Abbey in the first series of the hit period drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Julian Fellowes' much-loved period drama follows the goings on at an aristocratic country estate, where the Crawley family and their servants experience tragedy and triumph against a backdrop of political and social change. Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Dan Stevens and Joanne Froggatt are among the stars of this multi-Golden Globe and Emmy-winning smash. In the opening series, The Earl and Countess of Grantham search for an heir to Downton Abbey.

includedIn.title: Downton Abbey
includedIn.synopsis: An aristocratic family and their servants experience tragedy and triumph against a backdrop of political and social change in early 20th century Yorkshire.

includedIn.mediumSynopsis: An aristocratic family and their servants experience tragedy and triumph against a backdrop of political and social change in early 20th century Yorkshire.
